TopicTitle: A jet plane that is very stable

Articles.Content:
I created a Spaceplane that is very stable, the parts i used are the original in game parts

NOTE : I dont not take full cerdit for this plane it is inspired by ChickenKeeper24 on his youtube channel

the parts i used included

1 MK 2 cockpit

1 avionics package

1 nose cone

2 delta wings

2 tails fin

4 control surface( 2 big ones on delta wings, 2 smaller one on the tails fins)

1 standard carnard (which acts a tails fin)

1 Decoupler to dettach from main plane if something has malfuntion)

6 landing wheels

I HAVEN\'T succesfully landed the plane

hope you guys like it

you guys can modified the plane in whatever ways you want

Just Tested the plane

Max Celling Below 15000m

Max Speed 280m/s

Can fly half way across the sea infront of runway

Can fly for 15-20 Minutes
Looks a lot like a MiG-21, which is one of my favorite planes.
